title: 9/2/21: Texas Abortion Law, Biden Phone Call, Newsom Recall, Trump's Next Moves, China's Crackdown, Biden Approval Sinking, America First Sham, The Problem With Theranos, Woke Capital, and More!

itunes:title: 9/2/21: Texas Abortion Law, Biden Phone Call, Newsom Recall, Trump's Next Moves, China's Crackdown, Biden Approval Sinking, America First Sham, The Problem With Theranos, Woke Capital, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Saagar and guest host Marshall Kosloff talk about Joe Biden's leaked phone call, California's recall election, Trump's next move on social media, China's crackdown on video games & celebrities, Biden's approval ratings going down, the pro-war rhetoric from 'America First' conservatives, the problem with Theranos, woke capital with Vivek Ramaswamy, and more! Next week, there will be no Breaking Points show on labor day, and then Marshall will fill in for Krystal again on Tuesday. She will be back in her chair as co-host on Thursday.
